setBlockList

public void setBlockList(java.lang.String string)
Breaks the comma separated list of usable block ids from the configuration into a Java list of the individual usable blocks to check against later with the listeners.

Parameters:
string - The comma seperated list of usable blocks as pulled from config.yml.

reloadConfig

public void reloadConfig()
Reloads the HiddenSwitch configuration from the config.yml file on the disc.

Loads the default config.yml included in the HiddenSwitch jar file.

Saves the default configuration to a file on the disc.

true if successful, otherwise false
